department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2022-09-23 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a Laser Based Cutter/Engraver/Etcher (LBCEE). The LBCEE will allow the capability to rapidly produce custom fabric products, mark high value items, and serialize controlled items.
duration_in_months: If contract is awarded, expected contract start date is October 27, 2022 and expects to be completed by September 30, 2027.

full_summary:
### Contract Notice: Laser Cutter, Engraver and Etcher

#### Official Contract Title
Laser Based Cutter, Engraver and Etcher

#### Contract Number
WS3541169637

#### Amendment Number
1

#### Publication Date
August 11, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date
September 23, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT
Please note that the closing time for bid submission has been revised.

#### Expected Contract Start Date
October 27, 2022

#### Expected Contract End Date
September 30, 2027

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Commodities
* Cutting equipment (UNSPSC: 20101500)
* Laser based cutter, engraver and etcher

#### Trade Agreements
The contract is not limited to a specific trade agreement.


#### Geographical Scope
This contract is open to vendors worldwide. 
Deliveries will be made primarily to Canada and Ontario (except NCR).

#### Contracting Entity Information

* The department responsible for the contract is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) also known as (SPAC) in French.
* The department's contact information is as follows:
  + Name: Malko-Moore, Shamael
  + Email: shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  + Phone: Not Provided
  + Fax: Not Provided 
  + Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
  
#### Contract Description
The Department of National Defence is soliciting a Laser Based Cutter, Engraver and Etcher (LBCEE). The successful bid will have the capacity to rapidly produce custom fabric products, mark high-value items and serialize controlled items.

#### Additional Information
Regularly check this space (the above hyperlinked URL) for additional information.



No attachments or supporting documentation were provided.

This contract was previously announced, but its solicitation is still ongoing. As per the Government of Canada contract policies and procedures, amendments to the solicitation process may be made at any time the contracting entity deems appropriate. It is the bidders' responsibility to check the related notices section of the official government notice website for information updates. Bidders that fall short of those requirements will be considered non-compliant within the bid process.
